ValidationRule.description: if Binder Quantity and Spanish Binder Quantity = Null, then the Binder Cover Option, Client Name to be Printed on Binder, Binder Color, Binder Template and Logo for the Binder fields can NOT be populated by HRGs.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), ( (ISNULL(Binder_Quantity__c)) && (ISNULL(Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c)) ), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Art__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Outside_Color__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Template__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Logo_for_the_Binder__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Name_to_be_Printed_on_Binder__c))) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can NOT select a Binder Cover Option, Logo for the Binder, Client Name to be Printed on Binder, Binder Template or a Binder Color field value when no value is entered for the Binder Quantity and the Spanish Binder Quantity fields.
